mapper.delete: delete from ResellLikeBoards where member_id = #{member_id} and resellBoard_no = #{resellBoard_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ResellLikeBoards where resellBoard_no = #{resellBoard_no};
select * from ResellLikeBoards where member_id = '${member_id}' and resellBoard_no = ${resellBoard_no}
